game.name: Dying Light 2: Stay Human Digital Extras Edition
game.shortDescription:
Filled with digital goodies, the Digital Extras Edition gives you the full Dying Light 2 Stay Human experience and more! 

Enjoy Aiden’s story, as well as the ‘Bloody Ties’ DLC, and get a look behind it with all the extras! 

Good luck, and stay human!
game.genres: 액션, 오픈 월드, 호러, RPG, 생존, 1인칭
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, 싱글 플레이어, 업적, 컨트롤러 지원, 클라우드 저장, 협동
